## Collections.CollectorValidator.\_convertValue() method

Helper to convert a value, returning a [DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md) and formatting the error message.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected _convertValue(value: unknown): DetailedResult<TITEM, CollectorResultDetail>;
```

**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TITEM, [CollectorResultDetail](./ts-utils.collections.collectorresultdetail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

[DetailedSuccess](./ts-utils.detailedsuccess.md) with the converted value and detail `success` if conversion is successful, or [DetailedFailure](./ts-utils.detailedfailure.md) with the error message and detail `invalid-value` if conversion fails.
